frontmatter.title: Create IAM Role
frontmatter.description: To run a task in ECS with AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry Collector, we need two different roles- **TaskRole** and **TaskExecutionRole**. In this section, we will create these two roles with proper IAM policies.
